endpoints.name: production
endpoints.description: Production endpoint for the Automotive Skill

en-us.name: SettingsDispatch LU (English)
en-us.description: English language model for the skill

message.description: Receives the user's utterance and attempts to resolve it using the skill's LU models

setting.description: The setting to change, e.g. volume, temperature

value.description: The operation you want to set for the setting, e.g. activate, higher, on/off

amount.description: The amount you want to set for a numeric setting, e.g. eleven, minimum

type.description: The operation type you want to do with the amount, e.g. "by" or "to"

unit.description: The unit of measurement for the amount, e.g. celsius, percent
